submapp.hmm.Hmm.init_model¶

Hmm.init_model(classes_obs: numpy.ndarray, classes_dis: numpy.ndarray, ln_eps: float = None) → None¶

Initializes the model (Tr, Em, pi) and pseudo-counts

Parameters

  • classes_obs (np.ndarray[int]) – Observable classes used as a priori knowlegde about the model (training data)

  • classes_dis (np.ndarray[int]) – Hidden classes used as a priori knowlegde about the model (training data)

  • ln_eps (float, optional) – Order of magnitude (logarithm, <0) of the pseudo counts used to prevent null probabilities within the model. Defaults to None, in this case ln_eps = -20

Return type

None
